values: because i'm procrastinating. when i really really shouldn't be. wentworth miller's nose is funny in profile. also his eyes are very close together. and he has the scowliest eyebrows ever.
so i added a little colour. it was fun... and sucked up some time. plus i need the practice. hooray icies!
spent three-ish hours today doing tablety art. huzzah!

So I was asked to do this poster thing for my thatre company, for promotion and fundraising and all that jazz. my basic ink lines were as follows... now the guy who asked me to do it, said "and colour... like... watercolour.." i was skeptical about him actually wanting watercolour, but i said if that's what he wanted, I could do it. the result looks fine, on the original. But the photocopyablity of watercolour is less than good. so i went my own way. scanned the lines and used Photoshop and my tablet to do some cell-style shading. and i was much happier, and I think he will be too. hooray! and i spent way too much time on this. colouring it different ways and re-drawing characters. uhg. but it's done.
Alright. So my dislike for Deviant Art has led to the creation of an Art Blog. so I shall christen it! the Prunsqualler siblings, from the Gormenghast novels by Mervyn Peake. <3
